name: Pica-Link
description:
Note: Due to an issue with Itch.io, your save will be lost after leaving the page! Play the game on https://pica.link/ if you want your progress to stay!

Pica-Link is a relaxing puzzle game where you have to connect the numbers of the same color together in order to create pictures. Just turn on your favorite music or podcast, kick back, and relax!

A level editor is included, which allows you to create, edit, and share your own puzzles with others. Feel free to get creative with it and share your creations!
